Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with a wealth of features and benefits that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and the effort put into its creation, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product for $150. I trust that you will find its value to be well beyond this price point. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in improving your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
